short_summary: Engineering consultant for Arctic Gold and Silver and Venus mine site
description: The department is seeking an engineering consultant for the assessment phase of the Arctic Gold and Silver and Venus mine site. The consultant will conduct background review, data gap analysis, conceptual site model and HHERA, standards development, remedial options, and closure option selection. The consultant will work from their own location and may be required to work on GoC premises. The contract duration is from ASAP to March 31 2024.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Engineering Consultants for Arctic Gold and Silver and Venus Mine Sites**
==============================================================================

**Tender Information**
---------------------

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01013894
* **Amended on:** 4th Amendment, dated December 8th, 2022
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000233470
* **Publication Date:** November 17th, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 8th, 2022, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** To be determined

**Request for Proposal**
-----------------------

Indigenous Services Canada is seeking a qualified Engineering Consultant to assess the Arctic Gold and Silver and Venus Mine Sites. The successful contractor will provide a class 5 cost estimate and support discussions with the contracting authority and the Carcross and Tagish First Nation. The assessment phase will involve completing various tasks, including but not limited to:

* Background Review
* Data Gap Analysis
* Data Collection
* Conceptual Site Model and HHERA
* Standards Development
* Remedial Options
* Closure Option Selection

**Work Location**
----------------

The vendor will work remotely, except when required on-site at the mining locations. If required to work on-site at the Government of Canada premises, the vendor will be escorted at all times.

**Deliverables**
----------------

The consultant must submit all deliverables (reports and presentations) in draft form to the contracting authority for approval before finalizing the documents.

**Precautions**
--------------

The consultant must adhere to the most recent COVID-19 guidelines from the Yukon Chief Medical Health Officer and the Carcross/Tagish First Nation.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Name:** Alex Cormier-Howie
* **Email:** [alexander.cormierhowie@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:alexander.cormierhowie@sac-isc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 873-354-0959

**Attachments**
----------------
